CHAT.comment: NEW YORK TIMES COMPANY, INC., ET AL., Petitioners v. JONATHAN TASINI ET AL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:04 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF LAURENCE H. TRIBE ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF LAURENCE GOLD ON BEHALF OF RESPONDENTS
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF LAURENCE H. TRIBE ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
(Whereupon, at 11:04 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
